name: Sticky Keys (LemonProphet)
description:
This is my submission to the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021. The theme is "Joined Together", and Sticky Keys is a platformer that joins common controls together. Both the left movement and jump buttons are joined together, and the mouse triggers a dash while also changing elements in the environment.

All art and programming was done by myself during the 48 hour competition, and the following audio was imported.

Music is from Three Red Hearts by Abstraction

An explosion effect from timgormly

Enjoy the game!
